courses.entryRequirements: IELTS: 6.5 (≥6.0 per band) | A Level: BBB, min. 3 subjects (incl. English, Math for Economics) | IB: 31, Math HL/SL required, English B accepted (≥Grade 4) | National Curriculum: GPA 8.6 + SAT 1320 / ACT 28 or Foundation/Diploma.
IELTS: 6.5 (≥6.0 per band) | A Level: Min. 3 subjects (≥C), incl. approved English subjects | IB: Bachelor of Music applicants require auditions | National Curriculum: Foundation/Diploma Program

IELTS 6.5 (with no band less than 6.0). Bachelor of Music or equivalent degree with a weighted average mark of at least H3 (65%), or equivalent, with a major relevant to the discipline stream within the Bachelor of Music (Degree with Honours) that they seek to enter.
IELTS: 6.5 (no band <6.0) | A Level: Min. 3 A Levels, incl. an approved English subject (min. C). | IB: English B (min. Grade 4 SL/HL). | National Curriculum: Foundation/Diploma.

IELTS 6.5 (≥6.0 per band) | IB: English B (pass at required level for non-native speakers). Minimum Grade 4 (Standard/Higher Level). Math Studies not accepted for VCE Math Methods. | National Curriculum: Foundation/Diploma Program.

IELTS: 6.5 (no band < 6.0) |A Level: AAB (Math & approved English subject, min. 3 A Levels, C in prerequisites) |IB: 35, incl. English & min. 4 in required Math subjects | National Curriculum: Foundation/Diploma

IELTS 6.5 (no band < 6.0) | A Level: Min. 3 A Levels, C in prerequisite subjects. Accepted English subjects: General Paper, General Studies, English Language/Literature. Singapore A Level Knowledge & Enquiry (H2) also accepted (min. C). | IB: English. English B accepted for non-native speakers (min. Grade 4 SL/HL). | Additional Requirements: Audition for selection | National Curriculum: Foundation/Diploma Program.

IELTS: 6.5 (no band <6.0) | A Level: Min. 3 A Levels, incl. an approved English subject (min. grade C). Singapore A Level Knowledge & Enquiry (H2) accepted. | IB: Audition required for Bachelor of Music. AMEB not required but beneficial. |National Curriculum: Foundation/Diploma Program.

IELTS 6.5 (no band < 6.0) | A Level: Min. 3 A Levels, grade C in prerequisites. Accepted subjects: General Paper, General Studies, English Lang. & Lit., English Lit., English Lang. (incl. Singapore H2 Knowledge & Enquiry). | IB: English B (pass at required level), min. Grade 4 (Standard/Higher). | Additional Requirements: Interview required for selection. | National Curriculum: Foundation/Diploma Program.

IELTS 6.5 (no band <6.0) | A Level: Min. 3 A Levels, grade ≥C in prerequisite subjects. Accepted English subjects: General Paper, General Studies, English Language/Literature. Singapore A Level (H2) Knowledge & Enquiry also accepted (min. C). | IB: English. English B accepted for non-native speakers (min. Grade 4, Standard/Higher Level). Math Studies not equivalent to VCE Math Methods.| Multiple majors/instruments require multiple auditions.| National Curriculum: Foundation/Diploma.

IELTS: 6.5 (no band <6.0) | A Level: Min. 3 A Levels, grade ≥C in prerequisites. Accepted English subjects: General Paper, General Studies, English Language/Literature. Singapore A Level (H2) Knowledge & Enquiry also accepted (≥C). | IB: English required. English B accepted for non-native speakers (≥Grade 4 SL/HL). Math Studies not equivalent to VCE Math Methods. | Audition: Required for multiple majors/instruments. | National Curriculum: Foundation/Diploma Program.

IELTS: 6.5 (no band < 6.0) | A Level: Min. 3 A Levels, incl. approved English subject (min. C). Singapore A Level H2 Knowledge & Enquiry accepted. | IB: English or English B (min. Grade 4 SL/HL). |national Curriculu: Foundation/Diploma. | Additional: Audition required.

IELTS: 6.5 (no band < 6.0) | A Level: Min. 3 A Levels, incl. an approved English subject (min. C). Singapore A Level (H2 Knowledge & Enquiry) accepted. | IB: English B accepted (min. Grade 4 SL/HL). | National Curriculum : Foundation/Diploma Program. | The selection process for this specialisation includes an interview.
IELTS: 7.0 (no band <7) | A Level: AAB (Biology/Chemistry & B in approved English) | IB: 36 (English & Biology/Chemistry, min. Grade 4) | National Curriculum: Foundation/Diploma

IELTS 6.5 (with no band less than 6.0). | To continue with the dual degree students must complete first 200 points of study in the BSc(Blended) with an equivalent WAM of 70 and satisfy the University of Melbourne undergraduate English language requirement.
IELTS: 6.5 (no band <6.0) | A Level: Min. 3 A Levels, incl. approved English subject (min. C). | IB: English B (min. Grade 4 SL/HL). | National Curriculum: Foundation/Diploma Program.

IELTS: 6.5 (no band <6.0) | A Level: BBB + C in prerequisites; approved English subject (A/AS Level) with min. C | IB: 31, English B accepted (Grade 4+); Math Studies not accepted | Additional: Some majors may require a first-year math bridging course | National Curriculum: Foundation/Diploma Program

IELTS: 6.5 (no band <6.0) | A Level: Min. 3 A Levels, grade C in prerequisites. Approved English: General Paper, General Studies, English Lang. & Lit., English Lit., English Lang. (incl. Singapore A Level Knowledge & Enquiry H2, min. C). | IB: English (min. Grade 4 SL/HL). English B accepted for non-native speakers. Math Studies not accepted. | Selection: Includes interview. | National Curriculum: Foundation/Diploma.

IELTS: 6.5 (no band <6.0) | A Level: CCC, incl. Mathematics & C in approved English (A/AS Level). Min. 3 A Levels. | IB: 25.00, incl. English & min. Grade 4 in required Math subjects. English B accepted for non-native speakers. | National Curriculum: Foundation/Diploma.

courses.course: Bachelor of Fine Arts (Degree with Honours)
courses.entryRequirements: IELTS 6.5 (no band <6.0, last 5 years), Bachelor of Fine Arts (or equivalent) with ≥70% (H2B) in a relevant major.
IELTS 6.5 (≥6.0 per band) + Bachelor of Agriculture (WAM ≥65%, ≤10 tahun).

IELTS: 6.5 (no band <6.0) | A Level: Min. 3 A Levels, incl. an approved English subject (min. C). Accepted: General Paper, General Studies, English Lang. & Lit., English Lit., English Lang., Singapore Knowledge & Enquiry (H2). | IB: English (min. Grade 4 SL/HL). English B accepted for non-native speakers. | National Curriculum: Foundation/Diploma.

IELTS: 6.5 (no band < 6.0) | A Level: Min. 3 A Levels, incl. approved English (C min.) | IB: English (or English B with required level, min. Grade 4) | National Curriculum: Foundation/Diploma | Note: Multiple auditions required for multiple majors/instruments.

IELTS: 6.5 (no band <6.0) | A Level: BBB (Math + one science + approved English) or (Math + Further Math + approved English) | IB: 31 (Math: 4, Science: 4, English B accepted) | National Curriculum: GPA 8.6, SAT 1320 / ACT 2 (incl. English, Math, 3 sciences) or Foundation/Diploma | For DVM Pathway: Chemistry (VCE 3&4) recommended; Physics required for accelerated pathway.

courses.course: Bachelor of Medical Science (Degree with Honours)
courses.entryRequirements: IELTS 6.5 (≥6.0 per band), Bachelor of Medicine/Dentistry/Health Sciences (≤5 tahun) dengan WAM ≥70% (H2B) atau setara.

courses.course: Bachelor of Fine Arts (Film and Television)
courses.entryRequirements: IELTS: 6.5 (min. 6.0 per band) | A Level: Min. 3 A Levels, C in prerequisites. Accepted English subjects: General Paper, General Studies, English Language & Literature, English Literature, English Language. Singapore A Level (H2) Knowledge & Enquiry accepted (min. C). | IB: English required. English B accepted for non-native speakers (min. Grade 4 SL/HL). Math Studies not equivalent to VCE Math Methods. | Selection: Includes interview. | National Curriculum: Foundation/Diploma.
IELTS 6.5 (no band <6.0), Bachelor's in Architecture/Urban Planning (or equivalent), 70%+ WAM, within 5 years.
IELTS 6.5 (≥6.0 per band, valid 5 tahun) + Bachelor of Arts (H2B ≥70%) dengan major relevan.

IELTS: 6.5 (no band <6.0) | A Level: AAA (Chemistry, Mathematics, approved English) | IB: 37 (English, Chemistry, min. 4 in required Math) | National Curriculum: GPA 9.5 + SAT 1400 / ACT 30 (incl. English, Chemistry, Math) or foundation and Diploma program.
IELTS 6.5 (no band <6.0), 3-year undergrad (min. 2 years in sci/tech, last 10 years).

IELTS 6.5 (no band <6.0). | Within the last 10 years, must have: A University of Melbourne Bachelor of Biomedicine/Science (or equivalent) with WAM ≥65% and a relevant major, OR An undergraduate degree with ≥2 years in science, tech, or health, WAM ≥65%, and ≥50 points of third-year study in a relevant field. | Must also meet any required Year 12 or lower-year prerequisites.
